strings:
<voice_0x01000E0F><se_low>*: T-Take it to the bridge...!
Things done...got too far......gone...

<voice_0x01000E12><se_high>*: (Thanks for shutting him up for us.
But there's no need to make a mountain out of a molehill.)

<voice_0x01000E13><se_high>*: (He steals the odd thing or two and
his music is the pits, but apart from that
he's a great boss!)

<voice_0x01000E14><se_high>*: (You can have the harp back.
So maybe you'll let him off this time...)
<Cap><leader> obtains <DEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_1> and puts <IF_PLR_NOUN_I_NAME_1>them<ELSE_NOT_PLR_NOUN_I_NAME_1>it<ENDIF_PLR_NOUN_I_NAME_1> in the bag.
